extendedInfo.description: Itâs a Dandy App!We recognize that customers have choices. And, at Dandy Mini Mart we are dedicated to the creation of a friendly and clean environment with products fairly priced so that our customers will become friends who always feel welcomed in our stores. FIND A STORE AND GET DIRECTIONSFind the closest Dandy Mini Mart store and get directions from your current location. Find nearby stores based-on city and state, or zip code.  Itâs a Dandy app and it is as easy as that! CURRENT GAS PRICESGet up-to-date gas price information for Dandy Mini Mart stores.STORE FEATURES AND SERVICESFind a station with a particular fuel type (e.g. diesel or kerosene), locate the nearest Dandy Mini Mart with a Dominoâs, Pizza Hut, Subway, and Dandy Deli menu.PROMOTIONS ALERTSSignup to receive alerts about special promotions and deals available at Dandy Mini Mart stores.Dandy Mini Mart welcomes you to stop by to try the freshly made pizza, subs, pastas, and more. Have a Dandy Day!

reviews.title: Love it!!!!
reviews.comment: This app is the best one by far.... I recommend that others download it.
reviews.author: WENDELL KERR

reviews.title: Great app
